newsitem.title: USA: AirTouch signs wireless pact in Indonesia.
newsitem.headline: AirTouch signs wireless pact in Indonesia.

text.p: AirTouch Communications Inc said on Tuesday it signed a memorandum of understanding with PT Intidaya Sistelindomitra to offer wireless services in Indonesia via the Globalstar satellite system.

AirTouch and Intidaya, a private telecommunications operator, will pursue a license and establish operations, with Intidaya having primary operating responsibility. AirTouch would be responsible for technical and marketing functions.
Globalstar plans to offer voice, data, and fax services from low earth orbit satellite system beginning in late 1998.
AirTouch, with a 6.4 percent stake in Globalstar, has exclusive service provider rights in the United States, Indonesia, and nine other countries.
